text: Air Europa is a Spanish airline based on the Balearic island of Mallorca. It operates flights within Spain but also to other places in Europe and further away, it concentrates on the holiday market. Since September 2007, Air Europa has been a member of the Skyteam alliance."Corporate Information / Globalia ." Air Europa. Retrieved on 17 December 2010. "Air Europa Líneas Aéreas, S.A.U. ·Centro Empresarial Globalia. Apdo. Correos-132. 07620 Llucmajor - Baleares - Spain""Bases_Sorteo_Ginebra.pdf." Air Europa. Retrieved on 8 November 2012. "Centro Empresarial Globalia, PO Box 132, Llucmajor, Baleares, 07620, Spain" == Destinations == Air Europa flies to destinations in Europe, Africa and both North and South America. == Fleet == The Air Europa fleet is: *6x Airbus A330-200 *26x Boeing 737-800 *2x Boeing 767-300ER *6x Embraer E-195 == References == Category:Airlines of Spain
